about.title: About Me
about.description1: My name is Constantino Abba, I'm a Full Stack Developer from Argentina. I have experience working with NodeJS, React, Zustand, NextJs, and other technologies in the sector. I have a great ability to adapt and I'm always looking for new challenges and learning new technologies to continue growing.
about.description2: With a creative mindset, communication skills, and autonomy, my goal is to continue learning and growing in this ever-evolving field, contributing to innovative projects that make a difference.

hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: Turning complex problems into elegant solutions

projects.title: Projects
projects.description1: E-commerce focused on facilitating the sale and purchase of vapes, with user authentication and integration with MercadoPago payment gateway.
projects.description2: A real-time chat system with secure authentication, developed with modern web technologies.
projects.description3: Website to see the current dollar rate in Argentina and its historical rate using an external API

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Feel free to reach out for collaborations, projects, or just to say hi.
